Title: Generate SQL injection login bypass

I created a web program that generates an authentication system for my website. The login page has login inputs with encrypted input values, while all operations are done over SSL/TLS channels. The program accepts parameters from the command line and generates database table schema using a SQL injection vulnerability. Once the program is executed, it opens a MySQL instance and uses prepared statements to make SQL injection attacks.

Installation:
To install this program, download the code and extract it to a directory on your computer. Open NodeJS and install Dependencies using NPM. Once the program is installed, type in your desired options during a command prompt run.
```bash
node index.js
